# HMCharacteristicValueCurrentHeatingCooling.heat

**Case**

The accessory state indicates heating.

## Declaration

```swift
case heat
```

## Temperature States

- **HMCharacteristicValueCurrentHeatingCooling.cool**: The accessory state indicates cooling.
- **HMCharacteristicValueCurrentHeatingCooling.off**: The accessory indicates no heating or cooling.

items.description: The accessory indicates no heating or cooling.
items.name: HMCharacteristicValueCurrentHeatingCooling.off

title: HMCharacteristicValueCurrentHeatingCooling.heat
